New Records: Florian Wirtz scored the second fastest international goal in history (7 seconds)
Key Match Events: Florian Wirtz scored the opening goal for Germany, Kai Havertz scored the second goal for Germany
Miscellaneous Highlights: Toni Kroos played his first international since 2021, Germany is the host for Euro 2024
Others: France missed the mark in the match, both teams are preparing for the European Championship this summer, France will play Chile and Germany will host old rivals Netherlands on Tuesday
